title: Valid email and correct password - Successful Login
expected: User is redirected to the dashboard

title: Incorrect password - Error Message Displayed
expected: An error message is displayed for invalid credentials

title: Valid email and incorrect password - Error Message Displayed
expected: An error message is displayed for invalid credentials

title: Forgot Password - Password Reset Link Received
expected: Password reset link is sent to the provided email

title: Invalid Email - Error Message Displayed
expected: An error message is displayed for invalid email

title: Locked Account - Cannot Login
expected: Cannot login as account is locked

title: Empty Email Field - Error Message Displayed
expected: An error message is displayed for empty email field

title: Empty Password Field - Error Message Displayed
expected: An error message is displayed for empty password field

title: Password Reset - Successful Password Change
expected: The user's password is successfully changed

title: User already logged in - Cannot log in again
steps: Logged in user tries to login again
expected: Cannot login as the account is already logged in
